channel.title: How do i add new gfx or models?
channel.description:
How can i like add the new gfx ids for d bolts, onyx bolts, ags and other godswords. also how can i add in models, i followed the whole moparscape guide and it just weilds as something stupid.
When i go to add a new custom, this is what i do.
1. add the id + info to the class 8 file in the client. 2.add the model to the client folder. 3.compile both source and client. 4. STILL WILL NOT WORK FOR ME.
can anybody help!

item.title: How do i add new gfx or models?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

This sir, belongs in the mystical magical section that is known as the Client Help section.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add new gfx or models?
